short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you if there are potential spoilers for your favorite show

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plug in keywords such as game of thrones, mr. robot, or house of cards and this extension will alert you if a site contains any potential spoilers for your favorite show.
